text: {| class="infobox" style="font-size: 88%; width: 22em; text-align: center" ! colspan=3 style="font-size: 125%; background-color: red; color: white; text- align:center;"| Active sport clubs of SD Lovćen |- ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Football ! style="text-align:center;" |Football Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Handball |- ! style="text- align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text- align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Athletics |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball ! style="text- align:center;" |Rugby |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text- align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text- align:center;" |Table tennis ! style="text-align:center;" |Car racing ! style="text-align:center;" |Kickboxing |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Powerlifting |} ŽFK Lovćen is a women's football club from Cetinje, Montenegro. Founded at 2010, ŽFK Lovćen plays in the Montenegrin Women's League. ==History== While FK Lovćen is the oldest men's club in Montenegro, ŽFK Lovćen is founded at May 2010. Since then, club played and organized numerous tournaments, and on the season 2015-16 for the first time played in Montenegrin Women's League and Montenegrin Cup (women). On their debut in the First League, ŽFK Lovćen won fifth place among eight clubs. During the season, Lovćen made biggest win in the clubs' history, on 23 September 2015, against ŽFK Cvetex in Berane (5:0). ===Record by seasons=== Below is a list of ŽFK Lovćen seasons in Montenegrin women's football competitions. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Season !Competition !Pos !G !W !D !L !GD !Pts |- |2015-16||Montenegrin First League||5||12||4||1||7||20:49||13 |} Sources: ==See also== *Montenegrin Women's League *Montenegrin Cup (women) *Football in Montenegro *FK Lovćen *SD Lovćen Cetinje *Cetinje == References == ==External links== *Official site *Football Association of Montenegro Category:Lovćen Cetinje Category:FK Lovćen Cetinje Category:Women's football clubs in Montenegro
title: ŽFK Lovćen
